document_data.name: Earth Dragon's Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''Earth Dragon's Eye''' was a variety of [[tea]] from [[Shou Lung]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. It had a strong taste.
document_data.History: It was made available to [[Faer√ªn]]ians in the early [[1360 DR|1360s DR]] through the ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'', where it cost 50 [[gp]] per pound (453 grams).
